name: PowerUp Pool
description:
This is a pure prototype for a game i'm using to practice unity.

If you fire the other balls at the power ups they increase in value to a max of. the balls themselves show value with their color and number.

No menu so use alt+f4 to leave.

Mouse = Rotate.

E = shoots ball.

Q = Still working on it but stops ball instantly.

Space = Super broken buggy jump that I forgot to remove. spam it to mess with it.
